meanings.definition: A person or thing that arouses or excites.
meanings.sent1: The movie was an arousers of emotions in the audience.
meanings.sent2: The music festival had many arousers that kept the crowd entertained.
meanings.sent3: The puppy was an arousers of joy for the family.
meanings.sent4: Her speech was an arousers of inspiration for the students.
meanings.sent5: The sunset was a beautiful arousers of awe for all who witnessed it.

meanings.sent1: The arousers in the room were all cheering for the team.
meanings.sent2: The group of arousers gathered to support the cause.
meanings.sent3: The arousers at the party were having a great time.
meanings.sent4: The arousers in the field stood out with their colorful outfits.
meanings.sent5: The arousers in the garden attracted many butterflies with their bright colors.
